extendedInfo.description: BECOME YOUR OWN CLUB MANAGERiClub Manager gives you the opportunity to become manager of a football team. You shall pay attention to basically every detail inside your club, from picking up the ideal lineups for the match on Sunday to sign new stars, and even getting a loan to expand your stadium whilst ensuring financial stability.WILL YOU GET TO BECOME A MANAGER OF FIRST DIVISION?According to your performance in the last seasons, you will get offers to be the manager of either a new team or your same old club, provided they are happy with you, of course. You will start leading a modest team from the lower divisions and fighting its way into the higher divisions.NEW: PLAYERS WITH AGE!Now the players improve when they are young and worsen with the age up to retirement. It's not enough to have a great squad, you will have to watch the market in order that your team preserves the level you wish every season.5 DIVISIONS, 100 TEAMS, 2500 PLAYERS!You can enjoy a league with 5 divisions, 100 international teams fighting for promotion and relegation. In addition, the 64 top teams will battle to win the CupEASY, FAST, ADDICTIVE!Once you start you will not be able to stop until you win the league. In the metro, bus, car, anywhere and any time you will play several matches or even seasons. Manage a football team has never been so easy and fun.TRANSFER MARKET WITH AIGet the best players play on your team. Drawing up a five-star squad to win the league without effort!. The market is constantly moving, do not let your competitors get ahead.TOTAL CONTROL OF FINANCESTo take your team the top you will have to be a financial magnate. Adjust ticket prices, stadium improvements, buy and sell players. You have control of every accounting records to avoid missing any income or expense.INTEGRATED EDITORAt any time you can edit the names of players and teams, their averages, pricing, demarcation... and start a league with them. For example, you can create a competition with the names of your friends.STATISTICSTop scorers, best goalkeepers and even your history as a manager to not miss anything.More features:â Result game mode.â Game saved automatically and manual.â The names of the teams and players are not official. Neither is the simulated competition.â The game does not require Internet connection (only for license).To learn more, you have a video available on our website:www.cotrinoapps.comIf you have any suggestion, opinion, or any other issue regarding this application, write to:support@cotrinoapps.comPlease, It is important that if you find any error in the application give us the details by writing to us an email to the address above. If you only write reviews in Google Play, we can not answer you or ask for more information about the error to fix.

reviews.title: nice and very simple
reviews.comment: Nice for a short play somewhere in the bus or train. Simple rules, not much info to remeber between gaming sessions. English is a bit broken, but it is ok for me. imho worth trying.
reviews.author: Dmitriy Shyshchenko

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: The game is cool interesting but.... players get injured to easy, cards every match, hard to get money, build stadium is too expensive. The game is too realistic to be done with unrealistic numbers. Not worth buying waste of money brtter off with the free download.
reviews.author: Joshua Macias

reviews.title: Crashes of crashes...
reviews.comment: Unable to start a new career, coping crashes. No play, no success :(
reviews.author: EKREM KRC

reviews.title: cheap and cheerful
reviews.comment: cant organise tactics and game is limited but for 80p its not bad
reviews.author: Chris Speed

reviews.title: Fix this immediately
reviews.comment: First this game sucks. It doesnt even show you the game it just gives you a score at the end and that sucks and whenever I try to reject an offer for a player im trying to sell.nothing happens and it foesnt allow other teams to bid. This game needs major bug fixing and better gameplay. Oh and I have like 3 red cards and 3 injuries every game and that\'s just unrealistic and annoying fix that.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Since update one bug ive found is occasionally one of your players get sold without asking u first please fix annoying having to restart phone to fix
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Could be much better
reviews.comment: It was cheap so I bought it.  But in the end, there are better games out there.  aFM is one even though it\'s more expensive.  What I didn\'t care about is first off the english isn\'t the greatest, so it takes a min. or two to figure out certain things.  Secondly, the editor seems pointless.  I can make Pamplona the best team in the league, but I don\'t have the option to choose it.  I tested the editor out by making Caen a normal team with huge amounts of money, but while I\'m buying the best players around, so is everyone else.  So I\'m still loosing every game.  In the end, I uninstalled it.  Didn\'t seem worth it to me.  I\'d rather play aFM lite a few times and leave it at that.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very good can edit games teams etc
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: with a bit of work in the right areas, this could be a great football management game
